title: The Moto G Power (2026) is now available in the US
description: Motorola unveiled the Moto G Power (2026) back in mid-December, and today the phone has become available in the US, as previously promised. You can purchase one from Amazon, Best Buy, Verizon, and Motorola's online store in Pantone Pure Cashmere and Pantone Evening Blue for a recommended retail price of $299.99. [#InlinePriceWidget,14359,1#] The phone comes with a 6.8-inch LCD screen with 120Hz refresh rate and 1,000-nit peak brightness, the Dimensity 6300 SoC, 8GB of RAM, 128GB of expandable storage, a 50MP main camera with OIS, an 8MP ultrawide with autofocus, a 32MP selfie camera,...

title: Xiaomi to test the durability of its latest Redmi phones live on air
description: The Redmi Note 15 series was recently launched for global markets, and the Xiaomi sub-brand bills these devices as "Titan tough", with enhanced durability. Interestingly, Redmi now wants to prove just how tough they are, and will do so live on air on January 10 at 4 PM in China, which is 1:30 PM in India, 8 AM in London, and 9 AM in Central Europe. The live stream is already set up on X at this link, where you can follow it at that time to check out Redmi's "Titan Lab Testing", which promises pendulum drop testing as well as other tests, with "no edits", just "real toughness".

title: Honor Magic8 RSR Porsche Design emerges in promo image
description: Apart from its upcoming Magic8 Pro Air, Honor is also set to announce a new RSR Porsche Design model, which will slot in as the top-tier flagship in the Magic8 series. The device previously emerged in a rumor discussing its in-house developed 1-inch type sensor with a variable aperture. We now have our first image of the device, which leaked on Chinese social media, alongside some additional spec details. Honor Magic8 series group shot (left) and Honor Magic8 RSR Porsche Design (right) Magic8 RSR appeared in a leaked promo image alongside the rest of the Magic8 series, including...

title: Leaked test results from Galaxy S26 Ultra's new 60W charging fail to impress
description: Internal testing has shown that Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new 60W charging can fill the battery from 0% to 75% in 30 minutes, reveals Ice Universe. This was tested under laboratory conditions, whatever those were (presumably controlled room temperature). That doesn’t sound particularly impressive for a 15W increase over the Galaxy S25 Ultra. As a reminder, in our review of the S25 Ultra, we saw a 72% charge after 30 minutes. And yes, the S26 Ultra is supposed to have a bigger battery, though rumors suggest it will only go up to 5,200mAh (+200mAh compared to the 2025 model). A word of...

title: Google makes some Gemini 3 AI tricks free in Gmail
description: Google has made some of its Gemini 3-based AI tools free in Gmail. AI Overviews and tools like Smart Replies and Help Me Write were only available for users with an AI subscription (Google AI Plus or Ultra), but no longer. AI Inbox filters out the clutter in your inbox and gives you a briefing with quick highlights. It also sums up those long Reply to All emails, which is very handy. Help Me Write is just what it sounds like - you can give Gemini a prompt of what you want to write, and it will do the rest. You can also refine specific parts of the generated messages. Suggested...

title: Samsung posts Q4 earnings guidance: sales up, operating profit way up
description: Samsung Electronics just unveiled the earnings guidance for the fourth quarter of 2025 – things are looking up with increased sales and a big jump in operating profits. The company is reporting KRW 93 trillion in sales ($64 billion) and KRW 20 trillion in operating profit ($13.8 billion). Here’s a table that compares this to previous quarters – the quarter before, as well as the year-ago quarter. (in trillion won) 2025 Q4 2025 Q3 2024 Q4 Consolidated sales 93 86.06 75.79 Operating profit 20 12.17 6.49 ...

title: Honor Magic8 Pro review
Honor Magic8 Pro now available in Europe
description: The Honor Magic8 Pro was announced in China in October, then was released in other parts of Asia in November, and now it's officially launching in the UK, where it's finally available to purchase for £1,099 in Sunrise Gold, Sky Cyan, and black. It will be offered by Amazon, Argos, EE, Virgin Media O2, Vodafone, Three, Tesco Mobile, Currys, Very, and John Lewis. Available in a single 12/512 GB version the Honor Magic8 Pro comes with a £200 discount for early birds. The first 1,000 customers will also get a free tablet, while everyone will get a charger, case and a free screen...

title: OnePlus Turbo 6 and 6V unveiled with 9,000mAh batteries, 80W fast charging
description: The battery is probably the smartphone component that is improving the fastest – OnePlus just unveiled a pair of phones with 9,000mAh batteries. And we’re not talking about brick-sized phones here, the two measure 8.5mm thick and weigh 215g. The OnePlus Turbo 6 and the Turbo 6V are very similar devices. The 6 is the more premium model with a base price of CNY 2,300 (for a 12/256GB unit), while the 6V is more affordable and starts at CNY 1,900 (8/256GB). We have more detailed pricing for China at the bottom. Note that there is an early bird discount that drops these prices by CNY...

title: Future iPhone models could get a multispectral sensor for improved imaging
description: Apple has lagged behind competitors, especially Chinese smartphone brands, in adopting cutting-edge camera hardware. That may change soon, as a new report suggests the company is considering multispectral imaging technology for future iPhone models. Well-known tipster Digital Chat Station reports that Apple has shown interest in multispectral sensors and has reached out to suppliers. However, the tipster added that testing has yet to begin. Multispectral imaging works by capturing light in several distinct wavelength bands, including those not visible to the human eye. This enables...

title: This is the upcoming Honor Magic8 Pro Air
description: Honor is gearing up to launch a new member of its Magic8 series, and we finally have some actual images of its rumored Air smartphone. Honor Magic8 Pro Air and its key specs According to several posts on Weibo, the device will be called Magic8 Pro Air. Honor previously teased an upcoming phone that would feature “both Pro and Air features” and we now get some additional spec details as well as actual images of the device. Honor Magic8 Pro Air in purple and white Magic8 Pro Air will be 6.1mm thick and weigh 155 grams, as per a leaked product page. The device will...

title: Honor Magic8 Lite launches in the UK with a discount, free watch and charger
description: When the Honor Magic8 Lite was announced a month ago, the company said that it will reveal the price in January – well, it’s January now and Honor UK has delivered. The other European branches are oddly silent, though. Honor Magic8 Lite in Reddish Brown, Forest Green and Midnight Black Here’s the Honor Magic8 Lite (8/512GB) on Honor UK. The normal price is £400, but you can claim a £50 voucher to discount the price. If you order now, you will also score a couple of freebies: an Honor Choice Watch 2 Pro and an Honor SuperCharge Power Adapter 2 (66W). Note that this is while...

title: Poco M8 in for review
description: This is the brand-new Poco M8, and it’s the latest entry in the storied M-series. Our review unit is waiting for its unboxing, so let’s not make it wait any longer. Poco devices are usually well-equipped in these slim-box and no accessory times, and the M8 is no different. The M8 comes bundled with a grey silicone case, a 45W power adapter and a USB-C cable. The EU market will likely not have the charger bundled. We have the Green colored variant with us, which features a matte dual-tone approach to its back and a nice textured finish on the sides. The M8 gets IP66 dust and...

title: Poco M8 Pro review
Oppo Reno15 series, Pad 5 and Enco Buds3 Pro+ officially launch in India, here are the prices
description: Most of the Oppo Reno15 phones already had their international debut, except for the Oppo Reno15 Pro Mini. During an official launch event in India, the company introduced the handset alongside the vanilla Reno15, the standard Reno15 Pro and the Reno 15c. The Oppo Pad 5 and the Enco Buds3 Pro+ also tagged along, and here are all the prices for the Indian market. Oppo Reno15 series Let's start with the Oppo Reno15 Pro, which starts at INR 67,999 for the 12GB/256GB variant, while the 12GB/512GB version is asking INR 72,999. The handset is offered in just two color options - Sunset Gold...

title: Poco M8 Pro 5G and Poco M8 5G announced
description: Poco has finally unveiled the new M8 5G series, which includes the Poco M8 and the Poco M8 Pro. The latest M series phones come equipped with Snapdragon chipsets. Poco M8 5G The Poco M8 is powered by the Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 SoC, paired with up to 8GB of LPDDR4X RAM and 512GB of UFS 2.2 internal storage. It runs Android 15-based HyperOS 2 and offers a bunch of AI features such as Google Gemini, Circle to Search, and others. It sports a 6.77-inch AMOLED display with a refresh rate of 120Hz, up to 3,200 nits peak brightness, 3,840Hz PWM dimming, 12-bit color depth, and Full-HD+...

title: Oppo Reno15 Pro Mini goes official with a 200MP camera and Dimensity 8450
description: Some of the Oppo Reno15 family members already entered the global stage, but one of the new additions to the series, the Reno15 Pro Mini, remained under wraps until today. The company officially launched the Oppo Reno15, Reno15 Pro, Reno15c and the Reno15 Pro Mini at a launch event in India today. The Mini, as the name implies, features a somewhat small 6.32-inch OLED panel with a 120Hz refresh rate and FHD+ resolution. The handset relies on a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset paired with 12GB RAM and 256GB storage or 12GB RAM with 512GB storage. Despite its size, the Mini gets a...

title: RayNeo Air 4 Pro AR glasses with HDR10 support go global
description: The RayNeo Air 4 Pro AR glasses, which were unveiled in China last year, have now made their global debut at CES 2026. The TCL-backed brand showcased the Air 4 Pro and an eSIM version of the RayNeo X3 Pro at the event. RayNeo Air 4 Pro is being touted as the world’s first HDR10-enabled AR glasses. The glasses feature 0.6-inch Micro-OLED displays with up to 120Hz refresh rate, 3,840Hz PWM hybrid dimming, and 1,200 nits brightness. The Air 4 Pro offers up to a 201-inch virtual screen at 6m distance with 10-level brightness adjustment and a 200,000:1 contrast ratio. It is equipped...

title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health with Apple Health and MyFitnessPal integration
description: OpenAI is launching ChatGPT Health, which is a special place within ChatGPT where you can connect your Apple Health, MyFitnessPal, Function, Weight Watchers, AllTrails, Instacart, and Peloton accounts and ask questions about your health. OpenAI says ChatGPT is "designed in close collaboration with physicians" to "help people take a more active role in understanding and managing their health and wellness". And use ChatGPT more. Based on "de-identified analysis of conversations", OpenAI knows that over 230 million people across the globe already ask ChatGPT about health and wellness, and...

title: OnePlus reveals the Turbo 6V's main specs ahead of its imminent announcement
description: OnePlus is unveiling the Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V in just a few hours. While the company already teased the Turbo 6's main specs a few days ago, it waited until today to do the same for the Turbo 6V, the cheapest of the duo. Even though it will be the more affordable model, it shares the same 9,000 mAh battery with the Turbo 6. The Turbo 6V is powered by the Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC, and its screen has 144Hz refresh rate (the Turbo 6's goes up to 165Hz). OnePlus Turbo 6V specs The Turbo 6V's battery charges at up to 80W via wires, and it also supports 27W reverse wired charging...
